resources.string: Review additional apps. You can install them later as well.
Please wait while we finish setting up your device.

This allows apps such as Google Maps, Youtube and ride sharing services to run on CalyxOS. Disable this if you don\'t plan on running apps that require Google services. You will not be able to enable it later.
Note: If you enable this now, your phone will be set up to send data to Google. You can change this later in the microG settings.
